notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was supported in part by National Institutes of Health IDeA Program Grants GM115371 and GM103474, USDA National Institute of Food and Agriculture Hatch project 1009546, the Montana State University Agricultural Experiment Station, the Tomsk Polytechnic University Competitiveness Enhancement Program (project CEP-SAMT-208/2020), and the Program of Increasing the Competitiveness of TSU (project No. 8.2.10.2018).
